scripts.mergesd: git checkout develop && git merge staging
scripts.mergeds: git checkout staging && git merge develop
scripts.server: cd C:/Users/sandeepkumar.g/Desktop/nodebook/imibot_app_server/static && git pull && cd C:/Users/sandeepkumar.g/Desktop/nodebook/bot_platform-fe && npm run fe_build
scripts.heroku: ng build --prod && cd heroku/imibotfe && git add . && git commit -m 'heroku-deploy' && git pull && git push
scripts.heroku-nobuild: cd heroku/imibotfe && git add . && git commit -m 'heroku-deploy' && git pull && git push
scripts.develop: sudo npm run xgit && ng build --configuration develop --base-href /static/
scripts.staging: sudo npm run xgit && ng build --configuration staging --base-href /static/
scripts.staging-github: npm run xgit && ng build --configuration staging
scripts.v1: sudo npm run xgit && ng build --configuration staging --base-href /v1/
scripts.v2: sudo npm run xgit && ng build --configuration staging --base-href /v2/
scripts.staging1: npm run xgit && ng build --configuration staging
scripts.github-deploy: npm run staging-github && cd dist/botPlateformFE && git add --all && git commit -m 'deploy' && git remote add origin https://github.com/goodmite/imibot-fe.git && git push origin master
